titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Mayor, aldermen and commons of the city of London in Common Council assembled, as it was presented to his Majesty in council at Windsor, upon Monday the 18th of June 1683. Together with the Lord Keepers speech.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Lord Chancellor's Dept.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
